title: Freediving Bali
subtitle: Freediving courses for adults‚Äîfocus, technique, and ocean connection.
introText: Our Bali freediving program is designed for adults seeking to explore breath-hold diving in a focused, safe, and inspiring environment. Following the internationally recognized Apnea Academy curriculum, this course combines proper technique, relaxation, and safety training in the warm, clear waters of Bali.
featuresDescription1: We focus on efficient movement, proper breathing, and body awareness to help you dive deeper and more comfortably.
featuresDescription2: Strong emphasis on safety protocols, buddy procedures, and rescue techniques essential for confident freediving.
featuresDescription3: The course follows the international Apnea Academy curriculum, ensuring high training standards and global recognition.
featuresDescription4: Limited group sizes allow for personalized coaching and steady progression at your own rhythm.
featuresDescription5: Learn from certified instructors with extensive experience in teaching freediving in open-water environments.
featuresDescription6: Warm water, vibrant marine life, and calm dive sites make Bali an ideal location for freediving training.
structure1note: ‚Äî combining theory, relaxation, and water practice
structureNote: Flexible options available‚Äîsingle sessions, full days, or the complete 3-day course.
priceDescription: Includes open-water freediving sessions, professional coaching, and safety supervision throughout the course. Equipment rental is included; boat and site logistics are arranged as part of the training.
pricingNote: üìç Course dates are available year-round in Bali. Register your interest below to secure your spot.
